forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 64, with temperatures rising to around 66 overnight. South wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
